mapper.select: SELECT rep_item_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count, SUM(CASE WHEN report_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS weekly_count FROM report
SELECT rep_item_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count, SUM(CASE WHEN report_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS weekly_count FROM report GROUP BY rep_item_type;

SELECT rc.rep_cate_idx, rc.cate_name, COUNT(r.rep_idx) AS total_count, SUM(CASE WHEN r.report_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS weekly_count FROM report_category rc LEFT JOIN report r ON rc.rep_cate_idx = r.rep_cate_idx WHERE rc.cate_active_yn = TRUE GROUP BY rc.rep_cate_idx, rc.cate_name ORDER BY total_count DESC
